articles.title: LOFAR super-telescope reveals the far reaches of the universe - Euronews
articles.description: The largest pan-European radio-frequency telescope offers a unique eye for exploring the far reaches of the universe. #SmartRegions
articles.content:
In a field in the Netherlands, antennas are dotted around a circular plot.

articles.title: Watch Asteroid Turn Into a Fireball Just Hours After Being Spotted - CNET
